snippet: Migrant fishermen who had been enslaved on trawlers for years rode those same vessels to freedom after a daring rescue from a remote island.
lead_paragraph: Migrant fishermen who had been enslaved on trawlers for years rode those same vessels to freedom after a daring rescue from a remote island.

headline.main: Indonesia Frees 300 Men Found Enslaved on Island
headline.print_headline: Indonesia Frees 300 Men Found Enslaved on Island
